text: Sinners and Saints is the third release by New York-based punk/glam rock band Toilet Böys. ==Track listing== # PHLY 2000 (2:04) # Special (2:57) # Blue Halo (3:31) # Do or Die (3:17) # Influence (2:59) # Ride (3:00) # Untitled (:24) # Untitled (:25) # Fairies Wear Boots (Black Sabbath cover) (5:41) ==References== Category:Toilet Böys albums Category:1999 EPs
title: Sinners and Saints (album)
